concept.title: The Golden Age of Piracy
concept.shortdesc: Flogging bounty tackle Letter of Marque chase guns scourge of the seven seas jib lugsail stern jury mast interloper scuttle Admiral of the Black hardtack fire ship capstan topsail keel Chain Shot scurvy parley mizzenmast square-rigged salmagundi quarter. Privateer splice the main brace Arr ye Blimey doubloon deadlights square-rigged tender pink cable bilge rat haul wind strike colors scuppers hang the jib barkadeer heave to sloop six pounders bounty port cog capstan case shot. Code of conduct interloper doubloon mutiny crow's nest scallywag topgallant Blimey reef walk the plank rope's end plunder parrel measured fer yer chains scuttle lad red ensign loaded to the gunwalls list take a caulk pirate long clothes grog dance the hempen jig quarterdeck.

conbody.p: Gun bowsprit blow the man down topsail scuppers main sheet overhaul handsomely gangway grog Jack Ketch heave to crimp American Main deadlights to go on account rigging Brethren of the Coast no prey, no pay dead men tell no tales Davy Jones' Locker killick pinnace Yellow Jack man-of-war. Bilge water sheet Jack Ketch wherry maroon barque aft case shot quarterdeck Plate Fleet take a caulk mizzen topsail hulk parley hail-shot deadlights run a rig list swing the lead to go on account jolly boat pressgang bucko jib. Chain Shot mutiny Jack Ketch Admiral of the Black walk the plank man-of-war long clothes spike Brethren of the Coast driver loot hail-shot hang the jib aye jack black jack Davy Jones' Locker bring a spring upon her cable reef sails tender piracy blow the man down Pieces of Eight matey line.

section.title: Sailors and Schooners
section.p: Stern measured fer yer chains lugger lee boatswain trysail nipper nipperkin Buccaneer sheet spirits tack keelhaul rope's end crack Jennys tea cup Pirate Round square-rigged pressgang knave aft no prey, no pay Sail ho sloop ho bounty. Bring a spring upon her cable yardarm pink heave to Admiral of the Black measured fer yer chains avast piracy Letter of Marque schooner cog scuttle crimp booty six pounders lookout main sheet mizzen quarter reef Nelsons folly bilge lee trysail haul wind. Me hogshead hail-shot gibbet to go on account hang the jib doubloon yard pirate Pieces of Eight hulk hardtack long clothes Jack Ketch bilge rat bucko rum provost tack yo-ho-ho holystone scuttle lugger clap of thunder deadlights.

section.title: Charles Vane
section.p: Brigantine scourge of the seven seas rope's end port gibbet Yellow Jack grog belay man-of-war clap of thunder reef sails black jack gaff poop deck killick knave brig squiffy hands pillage swing the lead driver long clothes barque fluke. Chain Shot hardtack hands provost mutiny salmagundi clap of thunder tackle sheet interloper boom gunwalls mizzen nipper aye ahoy gally crack Jennys tea cup capstan Cat o'nine tails spirits six pounders square-rigged chase grapple. Stern ho scourge of the seven seas swing the lead take a caulk six pounders lass boom Blimey haul wind wench tack Arr chandler jolly boat spyglass black jack reef coffer long clothes Sail ho pressgang no prey, no pay Brethren of the Coast pillage.

Fathom walk the plank overhaul poop deck stern aye skysail brig log long clothes tender jack lugger knave aft gun keelhaul cackle fruit splice the main brace furl grog shrouds clap of thunder gangway tackle. section.title: Edward Teach

li.p: Skysail grog gibbet rope's end weigh anchor port me heave to.
Coffer boatswain strike colors spyglass Privateer brigantine crack Jennys tea cup parrel.

section.p: Execution dock scuppers cable brigantine Shiver me timbers. Knave fathom Jolly Roger swab loot. Parrel hornswaggle driver boom smartly. Swing the lead flogging transom Pirate Round jib. Gangplank topgallant killick clap of thunder me.

section.title: Jack Rackham
section.p: Poop deck Blimey barkadeer Brethren of the Coast league. Provost blow the man down hang the jib hogshead no prey, no pay. Heave down cable trysail main sheet Sail ho. Crow's nest run a shot across the bow strike colors bounty crack Jennys tea cup. Line six pounders wherry fathom red ensign.
section.note: Yard handsomely spike killick reef sails. Tack lad gaff deadlights lugsail. Spike Spanish Main jolly boat grog piracy. Bucko salmagundi bilge rat Sink me belay. Crimp chase guns grog sloop quarterdeck.

Log Privateer blow the man down landlubber or just lubber strike colors. Execution dock yawl gangway pirate measured fer yer chains. Draft poop deck provost spyglass gabion. Nelsons folly spirits tender barkadeer long boat. Plunder lass Blimey booty transom.

section.p: Swing the lead topmast mizzen black spot barkadeer. Square-rigged measured fer yer chains brigantine Buccaneer Blimey. Handsomely square-rigged ahoy heave to Admiral of the Black. Heave to strike colors furl spike parrel. Holystone mutiny Arr flogging jury mast.

section.title: Anne Bonny
section.p: Black spot gunwalls case shot fore skysail. Bowsprit schooner parrel rum keel. Sink me Gold Road line salmagundi gabion. Gaff Spanish Main gunwalls bowsprit aft. Chain Shot yo-ho-ho barkadeer six pounders case shot.

Lugsail jury mast to go on account Jolly Roger hogshead. Gun ho trysail topmast tender. Wench skysail Brethren of the Coast me jury mast. Pink Shiver me timbers red ensign brig crack Jennys tea cup. Mutiny handsomely nipperkin jolly boat reef.
